医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
空气采样检测到70-90％的家禽病毒，并揭示了50个隐藏威胁研究人员发现，活质市场中的环境采样可检测到70-90％的家禽病毒，通常超过传统的拭子方法，并确定了50种其他病毒，其中一些病毒来自非阿比亚的来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/air-sampling-detects-70e2809393939025-of-poultry-viruses-viruess-and-reveals-reveals-50-50-50-more-rored-More-Hidden-Hidden-Hidden-Hidder-Threateats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/air-sampling-detects-70e280939025-firtry-viruess-viruess-viruess-and-reveals-50-50-50-more-reare-rore-rored-more-hidden-hidden-hidden-hidden-hiddle-threats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d61d16d4-bebb-40A5-A45A-A45A-2A640BA89D0A Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:17:00 -0500 Air sampling detects 70–90% of poultry viruses and reveals 50 more hidden threats
稳定基因的发现提供了对衰老和寿命的见解一份新的研究论文于2025年1月27日在《衰老》（老化）中发表，第17卷，第1期，标题为“年龄不变基因：鼠参考基因的多组织鉴定和表征”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/discovery-of-stable-genes-offers-ingights-into-into-Into-Into-Aging-anging-ang-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/discovery-of-stable-genes-offers-ingights-into-into-Into-Into-Into-Aging-ang-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cb474eb-73EF-444F-8390-7C4C4C6531D1B6 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 13:03:34 -0500 Discovery of stable genes offers insights into aging and longevity
研究人员的目的是通过最先进的医疗技术检测食管预科剂Case Western Reserve University（CWRU）和大学医院（UH）的研究人员将使用他们发明的最先进的医疗技术，并获得了向Lucid Diagnostics Inc.的许可，以检测食管前药物，特别是Barrett的食管（BE）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/researchers-aim-to-detect-epophageal-proceal-proceal-with-state-state of-the-art-Art-Medical-Medical-technologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/researchers-aim-to-detect-epophageal-proceal-procer--with-state-state-state of-the-art-art-Medical-Medical-technologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A2659D9A-9B63-4B0C-9C19-9C19-3320ED0E8489 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:59:41 -0500 Researchers aim to detect esophageal precancer with state-of-the-art medical technologies
视网膜变化可能是阿尔茨海默氏病的早期指标印第安纳大学医学院的一组科学家已经确定，眼睛背面的光感应组织影响视网膜，可以作为阿尔茨海默氏病的早期指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/retinal-changes-may-serve-serve-serve-as----- indicator-indicator-for-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/retinal-changes-may-serve-serve-serve-as-servel-indicator-indicator-for-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16CD3AFB-379C-4F9A-962D-C34795D04C17 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:42:23 -0500 Retinal changes may serve as early indicator for Alzheimer's disease
与亚洲印度家庭发现的2型糖尿病相关的稀有基因变体一项发表在传播医学上的一项新研究，即自然出版物，详细介绍了稀有基因变种的发现，这些变体增加了多代亚洲印度人中2型糖尿病的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/rare-gene-variants-linked-to-ty-type-type-2-diabetes-diavesed-in-in-Asian-Asian-Indian-Families.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/rare-gene-variants-linked-to-to-ty-type-type-2-diabetes-diabetes-diaveeded in-Asian-Asian-Indian-Families.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0da9fdfdf-f017-440d-b729-3337964918a2 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:35:24 -0500 Rare gene variants linked to Type 2 diabetes discovered in Asian Indian families
科学家先驱粪便移植胶囊以增强胰腺癌治疗伦敦圣约瑟夫卫生保健和伦敦健康科学中心研究所（LHSCRI）的Lawson Research Institute（Lawson）的科学家是世界上第一个使用含有来自健康志愿者肠道的胶囊的粪便移植来研究粪便移植的人，以改善患者对化学疗法的患者对患者的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/scientists-pioneer-fecal-fecal-transplant-capsules-capsules-to-enhance-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-wartment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/scientists-pioneer-fecal-fecal-transplant-capsules-capsules-to-enhance-pancreatic-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67d566dc-C7A6-4A81-B8FE-680EC48A8A8BC2 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:29:41 -0500 Scientists pioneer fecal transplant capsules to enhance pancreatic cancer treatment
新的AI工具增强了对神经发育条件涉及的基因的发现研究人员开发了一种人工智能（AI）方法，该方法加速了鉴定有助于神经发育状况（例如自闭症谱系障碍，癫痫和发育延迟）的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-ai-tool-enhances-discovery-genes-genes-genes-genes-involved-in-nemervoademental-contitions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-ai-tool-enhances-discovery-discovery-of-genes-genes-genes-involved-in-neroveradional-comments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d30187d-9b01-4641-4641-8528-33d0055d41a79 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:24:31 -0500 New AI tool enhances discovery of genes involved in neurodevelopmental conditions
人工智能和深度学习转化口服潜在恶性疾病的诊断由于其高发病率和死亡率，口腔癌仍然是严重的全球健康问题，这主要是由于晚期诊断引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/AI-and-deep-learning-transform-diagnosis-of-oral-potentially-malignant-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/ai-and-deep-leep-learning-transform-diangnosis-orol-ooral-- oral-potientally-malignant-malignant-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82A3823B-F03C-46FB-88CA-F01555F1F1F60CF Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:11:33 -0500 AI and deep learning transform diagnosis of oral potentially malignant disorders

研究揭示了对胃细菌在胃癌发展中作用的新见解根据今天在Helicobacter上发表的一项研究，一项开创性的研究揭示了对胃细菌在胃癌发展中的作用的新见解，这可能为对癌症的更有效治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/study-reveals-new-inew-ineights-into-the-the-the-the-the-------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/study-reveals-new-inew-inew-inews-into-the-the-the-the-the-the-the--------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8756Ae3-7B02-4FA3-8E6A-E727B27130AC Wed, 26 Feb 2025 11:47:18 -0500 Study reveals new insights into the role of gastric bacteria in stomach cancer development
